quote: A good master leads you to the true master within. Only that master, who is your own higher self, can adequately answer all questions. – Ming-Dao Deng
fact: 60% of electrocutions occur while talking on the telephone during a thunderstorm.
joke: A man walked in to a bar with some asphalt on his arm. He said “Two beers please, one for me and one for the road.”
